parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the Space this submission belongs to

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the Submission to monitor Service Levels on

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Start Context
parameter.tooltip: The lowest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed

parameter.label: End Context
parameter.tooltip: The highest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed

parameter.label: Property To Find
parameter.tooltip: The Name of the Field/Attribute to search for a match.

parameter.label: Backup Value
parameter.tooltip: If no Field/Attribute value is returned, use this value

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the space to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the kapp to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the form to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to find values in

parameter.label: Wait time:
parameter.tooltip: Time you want to wait for deferred task

parameters.parameter:
<%= daysToWait = @results['Days Due']['Value'].to_f / 2
waitTime= (daysToWait*86400 - (DateTime.now.to_time.to_i - DateTime.parse(@results['Get Submission']['Submitted At']).to_time.to_i)).to_i
waitTime < 0 ? 0 : waitTime%>

parameter.label: Time unit:
parameter.tooltip: Unit of measurement for time (Seconds, Minutes, Hours, Days, Weeks)

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to find the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to retrieve

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to search for the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission whose children are to be returned

parameter.label: Data Source:
parameter.tooltip: The source that contains the data to use to create each task in the loop.

parameter.label: Loop Path:
parameter.tooltip: The XPath statement to indicate what data records to process.

parameter.label: Variable Name:
parameter.tooltip: The local variable name used to represent the data used in loop tasks.

parameter.label: Type:
parameter.tooltip: How many loop processes must be completed before continuing?

parameter.label: Number:
parameter.tooltip: If some, how many?

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to find the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to retrieve

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to find the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to retrieve answers from

task.label: Unassigned
task.value: ( # Assigned Team Null && Assigned Individual Don't Exist (!@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && !@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual'))|| # Assigned Team && Assigned Individual Null (@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && @results['1 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'].to_s.empty? && @results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') && @results['1 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'].to_s.empty?)|| # Assigned Team Doesn't Exist && Assigned Individaul Null (!@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && (@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') && @results['1 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'].to_s.empty?))|| # Assigned Individual Doesn't Exist && Assigned Team Empty (!@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') && (@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && @results['1 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'].to_s.empty?)) )

task.label: Assigned
task.value: (@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && !@results['1 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'].to_s.empty?) || (@results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') && !@results['1 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'].to_s.empty?)

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Start Context
parameter.tooltip: The lowest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed

parameter.label: End Context
parameter.tooltip: The highest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed

parameter.label: Property To Find
parameter.tooltip: The Name of the Field/Attribute to search for a match.

parameter.label: Backup Value
parameter.tooltip: If no Field/Attribute value is returned, use this value

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the space to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the kapp to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the form to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to find values in

parameter.label: Recipient List
parameter.tooltip: Comma separated list of recipients (Usernames, SMTP Addresses, and/or Team Names)

parameter.label: Notification Template Name
parameter.tooltip: Name of the notification template to use when sending this email

parameter.label: JSON Vars
parameter.tooltip: JSON input of miscellaneous values. These values are used to replace placeholder content in notification messages.

parameters.parameter:
<%= target = "" assignedTeam = @results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') ? @results['1 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'] : nil assignedIndividual = @results['1 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') ? @results['1 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'] : nil
if assignedTeam.nil? && !assignedIndividual.nil? target = assignedIndividual elsif assignedIndividual.nil? target = assignedTeam else target = "#{assignedTeam} > #{assignedIndividual}" end { "Percent Remaining" => "50", "Target" => target }.to_json %>

parameter.label: System
parameter.tooltip: System to search for ID. Defaults to Request

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Space Slug of the submission to get values for. Used to retrieve Request submissions, notification templates, users.

parameter.label: ID
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to get values for, required if using those or attachments in the message

parameter.label: Admin Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of this spaces admin kapp (typically admin)

parameter.label: Kapp Slug Initiating Notification
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp sending the notification (ex: catalog, queue, etc.)

parameter.label: Wait time:
parameter.tooltip: Time you want to wait for deferred task

parameters.parameter:
<%= daysToWait = @results['Days Due']['Value'].to_f * 0.9
waitTime=(daysToWait*86400 - (DateTime.now.to_time.to_i - DateTime.parse(@results['Get Submission']['Submitted At']).to_time.to_i)).to_i
waitTime < 0 ? 0 : waitTime%>

parameter.label: Time unit:
parameter.tooltip: Unit of measurement for time (Seconds, Minutes, Hours, Days, Weeks)

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to search for the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission whose children are to be returned

parameter.label: Data Source:
parameter.tooltip: The source that contains the data to use to create each task in the loop.

parameter.label: Loop Path:
parameter.tooltip: The XPath statement to indicate what data records to process.

parameter.label: Variable Name:
parameter.tooltip: The local variable name used to represent the data used in loop tasks.

parameter.label: Type:
parameter.tooltip: How many loop processes must be completed before continuing?

parameter.label: Number:
parameter.tooltip: If some, how many?

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to find the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to retrieve

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to find the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to retrieve answers from

task.label: Assigned
task.value: (@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && !@results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'].to_s.empty?) || (@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') && !@results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'].to_s.empty?)

task.label: Unassigned
task.value: ( # Assigned Team Null && Assigned Individual Don't Exist (!@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && !@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual'))|| # Assigned Team && Assigned Individual Null (@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && @results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'].to_s.empty? && @results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') && @results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'].to_s.empty?)|| # Assigned Team Doesn't Exist && Assigned Individaul Null (!@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && (@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') && @results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'].to_s.empty?))|| # Assigned Individual Doesn't Exist && Assigned Team Empty (!@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') && (@results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') && @results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'].to_s.empty?)) )

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to find the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to retrieve

parameter.label: Recipient List
parameter.tooltip: Comma separated list of recipients (Usernames, SMTP Addresses, and/or Team Names)

parameter.label: Notification Template Name
parameter.tooltip: Name of the notification template to use when sending this email

parameter.label: JSON Vars
parameter.tooltip: JSON input of miscellaneous values. These values are used to replace placeholder content in notification messages.

parameters.parameter:
<%= target = "" assignedTeam = @results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') ? @results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'] : nil assignedIndividual = @results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') ? @results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'] : nil
if assignedTeam.nil? && !assignedIndividual.nil? target = assignedIndividual elsif assignedIndividual.nil? target = assignedTeam else target = "#{assignedTeam} > #{assignedIndividual}" end
{ "Owning Team" => @results['Owning Team']['Value'], "Form Name" => @results['Get Submission']['Form Name'], "Target" => target, "Percent Remaining" => "10", "Summary" => "#{@results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Summary']}", "Details" => "#{@results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Details']}" }.to_json %>

parameter.label: System
parameter.tooltip: System to search for ID. Defaults to Request

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Space Slug of the submission to get values for. Used to retrieve Request submissions, notification templates, users.

parameter.label: ID
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to get values for, required if using those or attachments in the message

parameter.label: Admin Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of this spaces admin kapp (typically admin)

parameter.label: Kapp Slug Initiating Notification
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp sending the notification (ex: catalog, queue, etc.)

parameter.tooltip: Comma separated list of recipients (Usernames, SMTP Addresses, and/or Team Names)

parameter.tooltip: Name of the notification template to use when sending this email

parameter.label: JSON Vars
parameter.tooltip: JSON input of miscellaneous values. These values are used to replace placeholder content in notification messages.

parameters.parameter:
<%= target = "" assignedTeam = @results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Team') ? @results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Team'] : nil assignedIndividual = @results['2 - Get Child Answers'].has_key?('Assigned Individual') ? @results['2 - Get Child Answers']['Assigned Individual'] : nil
if assignedTeam.nil? && !assignedIndividual.nil? target = assignedIndividual elsif assignedIndividual.nil? target = assignedTeam else target = "#{assignedTeam} > #{assignedIndividual}" end { "Percent Remaining" => "10", "Target" => target }.to_json %>
